description: Try our easy to follow Lamb, Capsicum & Onion Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lamb, Capsicum & Onion Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 red capsicums, deseeded, cut into 2cm pieces
1 small red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped
3 small red onions, peeled, cut into wedges
2 lemon, 1 rind finely grated, 1 cut into wedges (wedges to serve)
1 tbs fresh oregano, leaves finely chopped
800g lamb leg steaks, trimmed, cut into 2 cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Thread lamb, onion and capsicum onto 24 pre-soaked bamboo skewers. Place in a ceramic or glass dish.
Combine lemon juice, rind, oregano, garlic, chilli and oil in a bowl. Pour marinade over skewers, turning to coat. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or more to infuse flavour.

Heat a barbecue plate or chargrill over medium-high heat. Cook skewers, for 8 to 10 minutes, turning until browned all over and cooked to your liking. Transfer to a platter. Cover and rest for 5 minutes. Serve with lemon wedges.
